body.p:
Louisville, Jany. 29th 1862.
To his Excellency
Governor B. Magoffin,
Frankfort, Ky.
Sir: --
I respectfully request an appointment as notary public for Jefferson County.

Your Obdt. Servt.
James A. Beattie.
I take pleasure in saying that Mr Beattie is a gentleman in every respect worthy of the appointment and respectfuly ask for the same

Jefferson Co
Notary
Jas. A Beattie
Issd Jany 31. 1862
